text: Park Kyung-soo (born January 25, 1969) is a South Korean television screenwriter. Park is known for his works on SBS television series, The Chaser (2012), Empire of Gold (2013) and Punch (2014–2015). == Filmography == *KAIST Kaist (SBS, 1999–2000) *Special of My Life (MBC, 2006) *The Legend (MBC, 2007) *The Chaser (SBS, 2012) *Empire of Gold (SBS, 2013) *Punch (SBS, 2014–2015) *Whisper (SBS, 2017) == Awards == *2013 49th Baeksang Arts Awards: Best Screenplay (TV) (The Chaser) *2013 40th Korea Broadcasting Awards: Best Screenwriter (The Chaser) *2015 51st Baeksang Arts Awards: Best Screenplay (TV) (Punch) *2015 4th APAN Star Awards: Best Writer (Punch) *2015 4th CARI K Drama Awards: Best Screenplay (Punch) == References == ==External links== * Park Kyung-soo at Pan Entertainment * * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean screenwriters Category:South Korean television writers
title: Park Kyung-soo
